lines.text: Why, it's Mugsy! Don't look at me like that, Mugsy! I'm your pal, Mugsy, your buddy pal! Yeah!

[as Mugsy]
It's coitains for ya, Rocky! Coitains!
No! Not that!
Coitains, do ya understand, coitains! Here!
[Bugs places a pair of curtains on Rocky's head]
Aw, they're adorable.
Does Hugo have a cottontail like this? Of course this one's 50% wool.
There, we got rid of those mugs.
They make me laugh.
[laughs weakly]
[as Hugo is driving them out to the country]
What a glorious night! Say, why don't we stop somewhere for a hamburger?
I'm giving you two seconds to give me the dough, see?
Okay, okay! But first, I need you to close your eyes.
Yeah, why?
Because I don't want you to see where it's hid.
Oh, all right. I'll count to then but I want you to give me the dough, see?
Don't worry, brother. I will.
[as Rocky counts, Bugs goes to the kitchen and prepares a bowl of bread dough]
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten. Now give it to me!
[Bugs hits Rocky on the face with the dough]
[Bugs has Rocky hiding in a trunk while he fakes a police raid]

[as policeman]
Where's Mugsy? Where's he hiding?
I'm telling ya he ain't here.

[as policeman]
Oh, yeah? He's in that trunk.
Now, look. would I do this if Rocky was in there?
[Sticks a sword into the trunk]
Would I also have the temerity to do this...
[Sticks another sword into the trunk]
... if my bosom chum was encased therein?
You're safe now, Doc. The police are gone.
Yeah? Which way did they go?
That way.

[Running out the window]
Help, police! Don't leave me here with that crazy rabbit! Help!
Some people can't take it, see? Nyah! Nyah! Nyah!
